Articles.Content:
Ha guys I don't know if this has already been discovered but I found a smiley face in Kerbins oceans using scan sat

Proof:

any thoughts?
You just have discovered a new easter egg!!!
Sorry, old news People were "discovering" it since old ISA Scansat mod was released.

Ya I kinda figured that one.

It was funny thou when i first found it

Secret DEV anomaly on Kerbin you say?

I bet he means the smiley face... click... yep.

Hasn't been any new easter eggs for a while. and some of the old have been buried/are bugged. I think NovaSilisko was the driving force behind the easter eggs and he's no longer working for squad.
That's a shame, easter eggs are fun!

I remember discovering that easter egg all by myself with ISA.

I really wish they would update/add more easter eggs.

If you are interested in even more Easter Eggs, take a look at my old Thread.

The Kerbin-Smiley allthough was already known way before I started playing it in .20

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60551-Spoiler-Easter-Egg-Stocktake-0-23-(Done!)-Pic-Heavy/page1

spoiler alert!

I remember the hype over what the magic boulder was back in 0.17, people were trying to connect it to the decoded SSTV picture from the bleeping pyramid on Duna, then attempting to figure out what would happen when the planets alined in the way projected by the SSTV signal, and then we never, or since never got an answer (probably nothing) and the magic boulder was removed. The end (cires)

The Magic Boulder was not "removed"

It just couldnt be rendered anymore because it was neither a ship nor a planet.

It is still in the game code and waits for its retrieval.

.

Sorry for the lack of clarity, I should've said that it was removed due to a bug/glitch

The Magic Boulder was not "removed"

It just couldnt be rendered anymore because it was neither a ship nor a planet.

It is still in the game code and waits for its retrieval.

Feels like I will get my shot at it in .24 ??

I was late for the party only joining for .20 ...

And I concur about updating the easter eggs!

I love easter eggs, just went and planted a flag on the UFO in the north poll,.......he he fun.

on the other side Im crapy at finding new ones by my self (soul reason for scan sat) in other words im most likly the last person to find a new easter egg

hmmm there should be a mod that adds more easter eggs to the game.....if only kerb town was updated.
